thread.title: Trump endorsed by one of Marvel's Avengers
thread.title_full: Trump endorsed by one of Marvel's Avengers | Washington Examiner

author: Joshua Axelrod
title: Trump endorsed by one of Marvel's Avengers
text:
Anthony Mackie, the actor who plays Falcon in Marvel's latest "Avengers" movie is endorsing Donald Trump in the 2016 race for the White House.
"I'm on the bandwagon," Mackie told BET on Monday. "I'm drinking the Kool-Aid."
Mackie, who also plays a political consultant in the upcoming movie "Our Brand is Crisis" said he would "100 percent" want to run Trump's campaign.
"I mean, first that'll be the best party ever when he won, and second, Trump's an easy sell ..." he said. "When you look at Trump, he's an easy sell because you can sell him as the guy who worked his way up from nothing. And I think if you're a 'pull yourself up by your bootstraps' candidate, people would identify with that."
  Florida Senate votes to remove Confederate flag from seal The new seal will replace the Confederate flag with the flags of ally nations, including France and Spain.
By Kelly Cohen • 10/19/15 5:31 PM Related Story: http://www.washingtonexaminer.com/article/2574118/ Mackie also said he believes "the best actors on the planet are politicians" in terms of how they have to conduct themselves, though he would never want to jump into the political ring himself.
"I don't think I could hack it in politics because if you question me, or say something about my family, I'm coming after you," he said. "So I would definitely lose every presidential race because I would be outside beating somebody up."

By Ariel Cohen • 10/19/15 2:28 PM
